description: Harrisburg: Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission has issued the following document:. Eckert Seamans Cherin& Mellott, LLC. Direct Testimony of Debbie M. Lestitian, PWSA St. No. 1, in the above-referenced proceeding.

text:
Harrisburg: Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission has issued the following
document:

Eckert Seamans Cherin & Mellott, LLC

213 Market Street

8th Floor

Harrisburg, PA 17101

TEL: 717 237 6000

FAX: 717 237 6019

{L0884267.1}

Karen O. Moury

717.237.6036

[kmoury@eckertseamans.com](mailto:kmoury@eckertseamans.com)

June 5, 2020

Via Email Only

Hon. Mary Long

Hon. Emily DeVoe

Administrative Law Judges

PA Public Utility Commission

Piatt Place, Suite 220

301 Fifth Avenue

Pittsburgh, PA 15222

[malong@pa.gov](mailto:malong@pa.gov)

[edevoe@pa.gov](mailto:edevoe@pa.gov)

Re: Cooperation Agreement between the City of Pittsburgh and the Pittsburgh
Water and

Sewer Authority - Docket No. U-2020-3015258

Dear Judges Long and DeVoe:

On behalf of the Pittsburgh Water and Sewer Authority ("PWSA") enclosed please
find the

Direct Testimony of Debbie M. Lestitian, PWSA St. No. 1, in the above-
referenced proceeding.

Copies to be served in accordance with the attached Certificate of Service.

Sincerely,

Karen O. Moury

Karen O. Moury

KOM/lww

cc: Cert. of Service w/enc.

Rosemary Chiavetta, Secretary (COS only)

{L0867152.1}

CERTIFICATE OF SERVICE

I hereby certify that this day I served a copy of PWSA's Direct Testimony upon
persons

listed below in the manner indicated in accordance with the requirements of 52
Pa. Code Section

1.54.

Via Email Only

Sharon Webb, Esq.

Erin K. Fure, Esq.

Daniel Asmus, Esq.

Office of Small Business Advocate

Forum Place Building

555 Walnut Street, 1st Floor

Harrisburg, PA 17101

[swebb@pa.gov](mailto:swebb@pa.gov)
